credit_line: Williams College Museum of Art, Prendergast Archive and Study Center, Gift of Mrs. Charles Prendergast
dimensions:
sheet: 8 1/4 x 10 3/4 in. (21 x 27.3 cm)
Other (Envelope): 15.2 x 12.7 cm (6 x 5 in.)
title: Letter from Maurice Brazil Prendergast to Charles Prendergast shipboard (en route to France)
description: Letterhead: Cie Gle/ Transatlantique [on flag]. 3 double sided sheets. Envelope has two detached sides, with Normandy-Hotel-Havre letterhead.
